description: Community turmoil grows as citizens fight over rumors and half-truths. Daria, after a tense conversation about forgiveness and risk, discovers the hidden final deletion protocol.
Daria authorizes the 'Halden_Final' wipe. BCI and Council servers begin deleting all records, citywide alerts spike as systems fail.
Citizens awaken to a world emptied of official memory. Streets fill with confusion, but the grip of the system is finally broken, forcing people to rebuild from scratch.
